recommendations.description: SGLT2 inhibitors are recommended to reduce heart failure hospitalizations and cardiovascular mortality in patients with HFpEF.
ARNI may be beneficial to reduce heart failure hospitalizations in selected patients with HFpEF.
ACE inhibitors or ARBs may be considered to reduce hospitalizations in patients with HFpEF.
SGLT2 inhibitors are recommended in patients with HFpEF to reduce the risk of HF hospitalizations and cardiovascular death.
ARNI should be considered to reduce the risk of HF hospitalizations in patients with HFpEF.
